answer: The main advantage of a horizontal business model for mobile devices is flexibility. This model allows for a wide range of phones based on radically different System on Chips (SoCs) to be offered. This flexibility is necessary as costs drop and the market expands. Additionally, providing complete reference platforms to OEMs allows for reduced time to market and provides a baseline quality and experience for consumers. This approach also allows OEMs to customize platforms to differentiate while avoiding direct dealings with consumers.
